<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Download Runtime Host Profiles</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v32.03/profiles/host/download"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorRuntimeHosts","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Retrieves the details and state of each host service runtime model in CSV format.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL command:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  -o <FILE NAME> \
  https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/profiles/host/download
```
